title: Alpha Dream, Gamma Nightmare
author: VD
content_html:
No one knows the essential falsity of Hollywood better than its long-suffering minions. But don’t pity them. They didn’t merely ask for it, they begged for it, and, in some cases, literally sold their souls for it. Still, if those two crazy kids can’t make it work….

DISCUSS ON SG
